definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: The mob fell on the killers and clubbed them to death.
sentences.chinese: 亂民兇猛地攻擊殺人者，把他們亂棍打死了。

sentences.english: The mob burnt down the embassy．（burnt the embassy down／burnt it down）
The police couldn´t control the mob so troops were called out．
sentences.chinese: 警察無法控制亂民，因此出動了軍隊。

sentences.english: Many towns MOBS while disorderly plunder the rulers food.
sentences.chinese: 很多城鎮的亂民都趁亂搶奪官府的糧食。

sentences.english: Light and yoo sung-ryong sea king not punish such MOBS, instead, let them join the army.
sentences.chinese: 光海君和柳成龍沒有處罰這些亂民，反而讓他們從軍。
